Collaboration: Find a group of like-minded individuals who share your passion for scientific research and collaborate with them on the project. This will not only help you in completing the task but also give you the opportunity to learn from others and share your knowledge with them.

Delegation: Assign specific tasks to team members based on their strengths and expertise. This will help in completing the project efficiently and effectively, and also give you the opportunity to focus on the most important aspects of the research.

Time Management: Create a project timeline and prioritize tasks based on their importance and urgency. This will help you stay on track and avoid procrastination, which can lead to feelings of jealousy.

Learning from Others: Research and read about successful scientific research projects on climate change. Learn from their strategies, techniques, and approaches, and apply them to your project. This will not only help you in completing the task but also give you the opportunity to learn from others.
Celebrate Success: Celebrate the success of others and learn from their achievements. This will help you overcome feelings of jealousy and instead focus on your own progress and growth.
